mapper.select: SELECT SUBPRODUCT_NO, SUBPRODUCT_NAME, SUB_PRICE, SUBPRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, SUBORIGIN_NAME, SUBCHANGE_NAME FROM SUB_PRODUCT

SELECT SUBSCRIBE_NO, M.USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, SP.SUBPRODUCT_NAME, DELIVER_TO, TO_CHAR(SUB_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "SUB_DATE", SUB_LEVEL, M.GR_LEVEL, SP.SUB_PRICE, DELIVER_STATUS FROM SUBSCRIBE S, MEMBER M, SUB_PRODUCT SP WHERE S.USER_NO = M.USER_NO(+) AND S.SUBPRODUCT_NO = SP.SUBPRODUCT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBSCRIBE S, MEMBER M, SUB_PRODUCT SP WHERE S.USER_NO = M.USER_NO(+) AND S.SUBPRODUCT_NO = SP.SUBPRODUCT_NO AND ${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
